forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 53F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with winds diminishing overnight. Low 7C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
